title: Kerawalapitiya Power Plant stops electricity generation as it has run out of fuel
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Electricity Generation at the Kerawalapitiya Power Plant was suspended on Friday (25) morning, as the power plant had run out of fuel.
Kerawalapitiya Power Plant stops electricity generation as it has run out of fuel
President, PM, Sirisena and Sajith at State Ceremony in Colombo
